#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int t,f;
	int s;
	cin>>t;

//char c[7]={'E','B','G','D','A','E'};

	for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
	{
	    map < string, int > mp;
	mp["E"] = 4;
	mp["B"] = 11;
	mp["G"] = 7;
	mp["D"] = 2;
	mp["A"] = 9;
	string fret[] = {"C", "C#", "D", "D#", "E", "F", "F#", "G", "G#", "A", "A#", "B"};
	string arr[] = {"E", "B", "G", "D", "A", "E"};
	  scanf("%d %d",&f,&s);

       string str=arr[s-1];
       int fr=mp[str];
       int co=fr+f;
       int coo=co%12;

       cout<<"Case "<<i<<": "<<fret[coo]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
